nodes.text: Team Tauntaun was one of the five Jedi strike-teams sent to Corellia as part of Operation Roundabout. Consisting of Tahiri Veila, Doran Sarkin-Tainer, and Tiu Zax, their mission was to detain Thrackan Sal-Solo.

The Corellians had anticipated the strike, however, and the ambush found itself ambushed instead. Although Tiu opted to remain inside Thrackan's residence as an infiltration asset, Tahiri and Doran joined Team Purella to improvise an escape-plan from Corellia.
